src:
Daniel James Tak Menyangka Bisa Langsung Jadi Pemain Inti MU
01 Nov 2019, 15:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Daniel James layak dianggap sebagai salah satu pemain terbaik Manchester United sejauh ini. Meski baru bergabung, dia terbukti mampu membantu MU pada beberapa pertandingan penting.
James merupakan salah satu pemain pilihan Ole Gunnar Solskjaer dalam proyek revolusi skuad MU. Dia didatangkan untuk menyelesaikan masalah MU di sayap kanan, yang sebenarnya terabaikan selama bertahun-tahun.
Performa James sejauh ini memuaskan, bahkan melampaui ekspektasi. Dia tidak kesulitan beradaptasi dengan gaya bermain Solskjaer yang agresif dan gesit.
Uniknya, James sendiri ternyata terkejut dengan performa apiknya di MU. Mengapa demikian? Baca selengkapnya di bawah ini ya, Bolaneters!
text:
Daniel James Did Not Think He Could Become a MU Core Player
Nov 1 2019, 3:00 PM by Bola.net
Soccer - Daniel James deserves to be regarded as one of Manchester United's best players so far. Although he just joined, he proved capable of helping MU in several important matches.
James is one of Ole Gunnar Solskjaer's chosen players in the MU squad revolution project. He was brought in to solve the MU problem on the right wing, which was actually neglected for years.
James's performance so far has been satisfying, even exceeding expectations. He has no difficulty adapting to Solskjaer's aggressive and agile playing style.
Uniquely, James himself was surprised by the slick performance at MU. Why is that? Read below, Bolaneters!
